channel.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
channel.description:
Okay, my computer specs are: [code]Intel Pentium 3 processor 598 MHz 256 MB of RAM[/code]
could they hold 20-30 players? if not, how many do you think?

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

How many do you think I can hold on my laptop?

Intel Core 2 Duo 2.6 Ghz Processor 250GB of internal space 4GB of Ram [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 22, 2009, 05:24:29 pm[/size][hr]Oh, and my ISP is RoadRunner.

Read full topic

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:290613”][quote author=n33bz0rpl0x link=topic=381592.msg2882607#msg2882607 date=1248415947]

the reason you might be having trouble is because your using a laggy or unstable source.
deltascape.

Don’t forget that it is also determined on how clean your source is.
[/quote]

it was implied wasnt it?[/quote]

No, it was not.

Read full topic
item.source: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote="CoonHunter, post:3, topic:288619"]1TB of space 6Ghz quad core processor 24GB of RAM... that one i built but i didnt have it hooked up to surge protector, and whast worse bought one that day the storm hit...[/quote]

STFU!
You do not have a 6GHz Processor because it would be fried by now, you dont have 24GB RAM because you cant afford 12 channel RAM!
You deserve to be strangled.

@OP
If you get a decently coded server, that is not wL based you should comfortably fit 20-30 players. Is the computer a sever? Pentium 3s work very well in them.

Read full topic

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

I WIN AGAINST ALL

I hosted with 30 people (31 logged and my computer crashed) with a Celeron processor (fortheshit) 128mb of ram (yes legend) and a 10Gb harddrive (All the char files were loaded and saved on a flash drive)

But yeah you need more ram to host a server

Read full topic
item.source: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @birdman4657 birdman4657
item.description:
@birdman4657 wrote:

your computer stats really have nothing to do with how many ppl can be on your server before it laggs (until you get around 40 players lol)…

it all depends on your internet connection speed and how well your server is coded

ppl waste huge amounts of money on expensive computer equipment when its the internet speed

Read full topic

item.source: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:288619”]I can only fit 15 max on myn before lag. and myn is

2.4Ghz processor
512MB of RAM
160GB of space

my old comp had(before it was hit bye lightning)

1TB of space 6Ghz quad core processor 24GB of RAM... that one i built but i didnt have it hooked up to surge protector, and whast worse bought one that day the storm hit...[/quote]
oh you’re so cool. i held 50+ on a SLOWER COMPUTER with 1.8ghz proc and 512mb ram. You probably have a crappy upload speed (ie DSL)

Read full topic
item.source: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“gon3d34d123, post:4, topic:288619”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=381592.msg2867440#msg2867440 date=1247530964]
my old comp had(before it was hit bye lightning)

1TB of space 6Ghz quad core processor 24GB of RAM... that one i built but i didnt have it hooked up to surge protector, and whast worse bought one that day the storm hit...
[/quote]

Thats not ‘the’ shit…

Thats about what a new laptop has?

(whit extern 1tb space)[/quote]

Are you retarded? A laptop doesn’t even have close to that.

@CoonHunter your server is horribly programmed or you have really shitty internet speeds. Because a computer like that should be able to hold at least 100-200 players if it’s programmed correctly with decent internet

item.title: Are these computer specs okay for about 20-30 players?
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

You might get away with it, but from my experience in computers and etc… it sucks, no offense. Upgrade your ram atleast! Or just buy a new computer, or atleast a refurbished one with more memory and GHz! For my normal pc (which i used to host on) i had and currently have:

2.0Ghz
2GB of RAM
250GB space

and my server that i’m trying to setup java on :S

4.0Ghz
17GB of RAM
1.7TB of space

My new server stats are roughly rounded off to the nearest GB/Ghz.

Read full topic
